name: DEN
description:
From the bottom of a den, a beast has been released.

Den is an exploration and ambiance game where you control an “half-fox-half cat-half wolf-half lemur-half many things” beast that crept out from its lair. Crawling through a network of tunnels and coming across some smaller and noisy things, it’s seeking to reach the outside world.

---

  • move : clic & drag
  • scream : clic
  • hit : long press
  • quit : alt f4 :)

---

Made in 72 hrs for Ludum Dare 38. Art, code, original soundtrack and sound effects made from scratch in Paris by La Mécanique du plastique & Kilosaurus.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/den
